Great gift ideas for guys on V-Day Find out his hobbies. If the guy is into wine you'll want to get a fabulous decanter. If the guy's into cigars maybe a humidor. Find out what he collects, what he's interested in. It can be as simple as golf balls with his name on it. You can come up with really cool concepts. leaders in Congress are serious about introducing legislation that would allow states, for the first time, to enter bankruptcy court. for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. "It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat," Wise said. With everything going on, I wanted to play well, Allen Iverson said. "I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here."
